title: 🇱🇰🏦 Trainee Bank Associate Job Vacancies – Hatton National Bank (HNB) Sri Lanka |  Sinhala | 2025
description:
🏦 Trainee Bank Associate Job Vacancies – Hatton National Bank (HNB) Sri Lanka 🇱🇰 | Apply Now!

📢 Kickstart Your Banking Career Today! Hatton National Bank (HNB) is now accepting applications for the position of Trainee Bank Associate. If you're a young and motivated individual with G.C.E. A/L qualifications, this is your opportunity to join one of Sri Lanka’s top private banks!

🔑 Job Details:
✅ Position: Trainee Bank Associate
✅ Bank: Hatton National Bank (HNB)
✅ Salary: Best in the industry 💰
✅ Age Limit: 18 – 25 years
✅ Minimum Qualification: 3 simple passes in G.C.E. A/L (any stream)
✅ Closing Date: May 14, 2025
✅ Job Type: Full-Time / Entry-Level

💼 Why Join HNB?
✔️ Join a leading private bank with a strong reputation
✔️ Attractive salary package and benefits
✔️ Structured training and career advancement opportunities
✔️ Gain professional banking experience from day one

📩 How to Apply:
Submit your application before May 14, 2025

Visit the HNB Careers Page or follow instructions in the official job post

🌐 For More Information: https://www.hnb.net/about-the-bank/careers

🚀 Apply now and begin your professional journey with HNB – one of Sri Lanka’s most trusted banks!

Connect with us on social media for more tips and updates:

title: SOLO by HNB සාක්කුවටත් ඇප් එකක්
description:
Save any card, any bank account to pay with SOLO Direct Pay Use Direct Pay for transactions on custom orders (prescriptions, restaurant orders) and pay with just a reference code provided by the vendor. Digital Account Opening Instantly open a savings account from wherever you are with the Digital Account Opening tab on SOLO. Register with a few simple steps. Use the account to transfer, pay through SOLO, and any other banking needs. SOLO Gifts Purchase gift vouchers by selecting a vendor from the list of vendors through the app and send it to anyone on their contact list. The recipient will then scan the QR code at the merchant and redeem the voucher. If the recipient is not on SOLO, they can still redeem the voucher. 60-Day Login The keep-me-logged in the feature will enable you to remain logged to the app for ease of using the app at checkout counters. 4-Digit Pin A unique 4 Digit pin will enable you to make quick payments at checkout counters, as well as whenever you proceed with any transaction. Billers Pay utility and phone bills by linking any savings/current bank account for convenient and hassle-free transactions. Coupons Pay less and enjoy more with Coupons. Purchase coupons easily via the app. Sinhala Geek Show by Chanux Bro.

🔵 Are you looking for a comprehensive guide on using the HNB Digital Banking App for convenient online banking in Sri Lanka? Look no further! In this detailed tutorial video in Sinhala, we walk you through the entire process, from downloading the app to making transactions and payments, all from the comfort of your device.

🔵 Our step-by-step instructions will help you get started with HNB Digital Banking App easily. Learn how to register your account, log in securely, explore the app's features, and discover how to perform tasks like checking #transfer  your account balance, viewing transaction history, transferring funds, and paying bills seamlessly.

🔵 Worried about security? We've got you covered! Discover how to set up robust security measures, including strong passwords, PINs, and biometric authentication, ensuring your financial information remains safe.

🔵 Whether you're new to online banking or looking to maximize your HNB Digital Banking App experience, this tutorial is designed for you. Follow along and gain the confidence to manage your finances conveniently and efficiently, right at your fingertips.

🔵 Don't miss out on the convenience and flexibility of modern banking. Watch our tutorial now and unlock the power of HNB Digital Banking App. Like, share, and subscribe for more helpful guides!

title: How to withdraw money easily from HNB ATM | HNB ATM එකෙන් සල්ලි ගන්නෙ මෙහෙමයි
description:
පැය 24 පුරාම ක්‍රියාත්මක වන හැටන් නැෂනල් බැංකුවේ ATM යන්ත්‍රයෙන් ඉතා නිවැරදිව සහ පහසුවෙන් මුදල් ලබාගැනීමේ ක්‍රමවේදය මෙම වීඩියෝවෙන් විස්තර කරනු ලබයි.
බැංකුවේ පෝලිම් වල රැඳී නොසිට දවසේ ඕනෑම වේලාවක ඉතාමත් ඉක්මනින් මුදල් ලබා ගැනීමට හැකි වීම නිසා මෙම HNB ATM යන්ත්‍රය භාවිතයට බොහෝ දෙනා පෙළඹේ.

එමෙන්ම VISA ලකුණ සහිත ඕනෑම ATM කාඩ් පතක් මෙම යන්ත්‍රයට ඇතුළත් කර මුදල් ලබා ගත හැකිවීම තවත් වාසියකි.

දිනකට ලබාගත හැකි උපරිම මුදල රුපියල් ලක්ෂ දෙකක් වීම සහ සෑම මුදල් ලබාගැනීමකදී ම රුපියල් 5 ක සේවා ගාස්තුවක් අය වීම අවාසියක් ලෙස හඳුන්වා දිය හැකිය.

ඔබ HNB ATM යන්ත්‍රය භාවිතා කිරීමේදී ඇතිවුණු අත්දැකීම්, කමෙන්ට් තීරයේ සඳහන් කරන මෙන් ඉල්ලමි ස්තුතියි.

#gandaramaster #Nammadaal
#HNB
#hnb

title: HNB Digital Banking App in Tamil | தமிழில்
description:
உங்கள் சந்தேகங்களும் அவற்றிற்கான விடைகளும்....
Timeline of this Video
0:54 - Digital Banking என்றால் என்ன?
1:20 - Digital Banking Download செய்வது எப்படி?
6:12 - Digital Banking பயன்படுத்துவது எப்படி?
6:40 - Digital Bankingஇன் பாதுகாப்பு நடவடிக்கைகள்
          Passcode மாற்றுவது எப்படி?
          Finger Print Activate செய்வது எப்படி?
          Face ID Activate செய்வது எப்படி?
8:02 - Peak Balance Activate செய்வது எப்படி?
8:32 - E-Passbook Activate செய்வது எப்படி?
8:49 - Account preferenceல் என்ன மாஜிக் செய்யலாம்?
10:15 - Fund Transfers
                ஒரு முறை மட்டும் ஒருவருக்கு Fund Transfer செய்ய வேண்டுமா?
               அடிக்கடி ஒருவருக்கு  Fund Trasfer செய்ய வேண்டுமா?
15:17 - Bill Payment செய்வது எப்படி?
16:24  - எதிர்காலத்தில் வரவிருக்கும் வரப்பிரசாதங்கள்
16:35 - ஏனையவை..


வங்கிச்சேவையை இணையத்தளமூடாக வழங்கும் இலங்கையின் வங்கிகளில் ஒன்றான Hatton National Bank தனது வாடிக்கையாளர்களுக்கு முற்றிலும் புதிய டிஜிட்டல் அனுபவத்தை வழங்கும் நோக்கில் நீண்ட காலமாக பாவனையில் இருந்த முந்திய இணையத்தள வங்கி வசதியிலும் பார்க்க 'தரமான', 'பாவனைக்கு இலகுவான' அதேசமயம் "பாதுகாப்பு அம்சங்கள் பலவற்றை உள்ளடக்கியவாறு" அறிமுகப்படுத்தியிருக்கும் செயலியே HNB Digital Banking.

முழுக்க முழுக்க திறன்பேசியை தளமாகக் கொண்டியங்கும் இச் செயலி எதிர்வரும் காலங்களில் இணையம் மூலமாகவும் வாடிக்கையாளர்களுக்கு வங்கி நடவடிக்கைகளை வழங்க முயற்சிக்கிறது.

engadachannel@yahoo.com என்ற மின்னஞ்சல் முகவரியூடாக எங்களை தொடர்புகொள்ளலாம்.
To contact for copy right issues and Advertisement, Email to engadachannel@yahoo.com

title: ඔබේ සිහින නිවස ඔබටම හිමි කර දෙන HNB නිවාස ණය!
description:
සෑම දවසකම ඔබ සිහින දකින, ඔබේ සිහින නිවස ඔබටම හිමි කර දෙන HNB නිවාස ණය! 
වසර 5ක් දක්වා පොලිය පමණක් ගෙවීමේ අවස්ථාව, ආදායම් සමඟ වාරික වැඩි කරගැනීමේ අවස්ථාව, අවසන් ගෙවීම ලෙස මුල් ණය මුදලෙන් 50%ක් ගෙවීමේ හැකියාව, වසර 25ක් පුරා ගෙවීම් කාලයක් සහ අඩුම පොලී අනුපාතය සමඟ, ඔබේම නිවසක් හිමිකර ගැනීමේ සතුට ඔබටත්!
ඔබට සතුට හිමි කර දීම අපේද සතුටයි!

වැඩි විස්තර සඳහා පිවිසෙන්න https://bit.ly/HNBHomeLoan
